Health Everyday

Feel Better About Finding Health Insurance

Primo Medical Services is Accredited by Ogun State Health Insurance Agency
(OGSHIA) as a Third Party Administrator

Get Started
Pricing Plans

We are proud to announce that Primo Medical Services has been officially accredited as a third-party administrator by the Ogun State Health Insurance Agency.” Our primary obligation is to extend the benefits of the Ogun State Health Insurance Scheme to all residents of the state, ensuring more individuals and families have access to comprehensive and affordable healthcare coverage

Get Started

Key Highlights

  • Drive the Uptake of the Health Insurance Scheme by Residents of Ogun State
  • Commitment to Quality Service
  • Collaboration for Affordable Healthcare
  • Strengthening the Ogun State Health Insurance Scheme
